HomePage.speech: Hello, welcome to IT and tea

Register.title: Register
Register.emailAlertDescription: A registration email has been sent to your mailbox. Please click the invitation link to continue!

CreateAccount.title: Create an IT&TEA account
CreateAccount.description: One last step before starting your free trial.
CreateAccount.tokenExpiredDescription: The link you clicked has expired. Please request a new link to continue.
CreateAccount.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
CreateAccount.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 4 characters
CreateAccount.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
CreateAccount.passwordLowerCase: Password must contain a lowercase letter
CreateAccount.passwordUpperCase: Password must contain an uppercase letter
CreateAccount.accountCreationSuccessDescription: Your IT&TEA account has been successfully created and you are now logged in.
